entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 24. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy near midnight with 60 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind northeast 30 km/h becoming light overnight. Low minus 24. Wind chill minus 37 this evening and minus 31 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 2:00 PM MDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 20. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries early in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 20. Wind chill near minus 31. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 2:00 PM MDT Friday 31 March 2023
